typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		storeId as short,
		productCode as string,
		quantity as short,
		logQuantity as double,
		advertising as boolean,
		price as double,
		weekStarting as date,
		id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> RetailSalesSource
source(output(
		id as string,
		productCode as string,
		basePrice as string,
		wholeSaleCost as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Products
RetailSalesSource, Products lookup(RetailSalesSource@productCode == Products@productCode,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		quantity,
		logQuantity,
		advertising,
		price,
		weekStarting,
		productCode = Products@productCode,
		basePrice,
		wholeSaleCost
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
